description:
Humanity watches in horror as the Four-Beasts easily destroy the military`s strongest weapons, but all hope is not lost - the Heavenly Kings are about to join the fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Hachi "Infini Bee" Toriko Tai Shingata GT Robo
Legendary Bee, Infinibee! Toriko vs. New-Style GT Robot!
伝説の蜂"インフィニ・ビー" トリコVS新型GTロボ
